item.title: A whale has sold 425 BTC over the past 4 days and shifted its holdings to 10,567 ETH.
item.description: On September 2nd, as monitored by LookOnChain, a whale address 0xFf15 sold 425 BTC ($46.5 million) and purchased 10,567 ETH ($46.5 million) within the past 4 days.

item.title: Sky Founder: Sky Core Simplifies Significantly Reducing Expenses, Current Protocol's Annualized Revenue Reaches $3.38 Billion
item.description: On September 2nd, Rune Christensen, the founder of Sky (formerly MakerDAO), stated on social media, "After significantly reducing core expenses through the simplification of Sky Core, the profit page has been updated. Based on a three-month fee annualized calculation, it now shows real-time stable fee income and savings rate expenditures. The current annualized profit has reached $338 million."

item.title: In the past 5 days, Galaxy Digital has transferred 500,000 SOL to Coinbase, equivalent to approximately $103 million.
item.description: On September 2nd, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, Galaxy Digital has deposited 500,000 SOL tokens (approximately $103 million) into Coinbase within the past 5 days.

item.title: Bridgewater Fund Founder: International Investors Have Started Moving From US Treasuries to Gold
item.description: On September 2nd, Ray Dalio, the founder of Bridgewater Associates, mentioned that international investors have started to transfer from US Treasury bonds to gold. (FX678)

item.title: 0xSun Success Story: Earned Over $1 Million in Profit by Shorting WLFI
item.description: On September 2nd, Smart Money and crypto KOL 0xsun.sol (@0xSunNFT) disclosed on social media that they had achieved a profit of over $1 million by shorting WLFI.0xSun's screenshot indicates that they closed 1279 WLFI tokens. The opening price was $0.32 and the closing price was $0.238, resulting in a profit of $1.048 million.

item.title: The probability on Polymarket of "Trump Ceasing to be President this Year" is currently at 10%.
item.description: On September 2nd, based on the information on the relevant page, the probability on Polymarket that "Trump will step down as president this year" is currently 10%.

item.title: Trump is scheduled to deliver a speech at the White House this Wednesday at 2 a.m.
item.description: On September 2nd, Trump is scheduled to deliver a speech at the White House on Tuesday afternoon at 2:00 PM Eastern Time (2:00 AM Wednesday Beijing Time). (Jin10)Previously, on August 30th, Pence said that if Trump faced a "serious tragedy", he was prepared to assume the presidency. But he stated that the 79-year-old Trump is in good health, and despite recent concerns about his health, he still has "amazing energy". Axios Global Affairs Reporter Barak Ravid posted that a U.S. official said that Trump is in good health and will be going to play golf locally this morning. At present, widespread speculation about Trump's health continues to spread on social media.

item.title: If Bitcoin breaks $112,000, the mainstream CEX total short liquidation volume will reach $973 million.
item.description: On September 2nd, based on Coinglass data, if Bitcoin manages to break through $112,000, the cumulative short liquidation intensity of mainstream CEX will reach $973 million.Conversely, if Bitcoin drops below $108,000, the cumulative long liquidation intensity of mainstream CEX will reach $773 million.BlockBeats Notes: The liquidation chart does not provide the exact number of contracts to be liquidated or the precise value of the contracts being liquidated. The bars on the liquidation chart actually represent the significance of each liquidation cluster in relation to adjacent liquidation clusters, that is, intensity.Therefore, the liquidation chart shows to what extent the asset price will be impacted when it reaches a certain level. Higher "liquidation bars" indicate that the price will undergo a more intense reaction due to a surge in liquidity.

item.title: Ethereum's active address count in August reached 19.45 million, hitting a new high since May 2021
item.description: On September 2nd, as per everstake.eth, the quantity of active addresses on Ethereum came to 19.45 million in August, attaining a new peak since May 2021 (20.27 million).

item.title: Top Solana Launchpad Market Share in the Last 24 Hours: pump.fun, Letsbonk, Believe ranked in the top three
item.description: On September 2nd, according to the Jupiter Data Dashboard, in the past 24 hours within the Solana launchpad market share ranking, pump.fun held the top position with 70.2%, Letsbonk came in second with 21%, and Believe ranked third with 1.82%.
